title: Eileen Ahasic, Ian Bierig

organizations.name: united states district court for the eastern district of new york

text: Photo Credit Kristen Beinke Eileen Rose Ahasic and Ian Alexander Harper Bierig were married Feb. 11 at the Conrad B. Duberstein Courthouse in Brooklyn. Chief Judge Carla E. Craig of the bankruptcy division of the United States District Court for the Eastern District of New York officiated. Mrs. Bierig, 33, is an executive director of global marketing for Estée Lauder in Manhattan, where she develops marketing strategies for the introduction of new skin-care products. She graduated from Northwestern and received an M.B.A. from Columbia. She is the daughter of Christine Berka-Ahasic of Brooklyn and C. A. Mark Ahasic of Darien, Conn. The groom, 34, works in Manhattan for Alexander Development Group, a residential and commercial property developer. He graduated from the University of California, Berkeley and received a master’s degree in real estate development from Columbia. He is the son of Darlene H. Bierig and Bob Bierig of Santa Barbara, Calif. The couple met in September 2011 at a viewing party at the Australian Bar in Manhattan for a University of California football game. A version of this article appears in print on February 12, 2017, on Page ST18 of the New York edition with the headline: Eileen Ahasic, Ian Bierig. Order Reprints | Today's Paper | Subscribe
